pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of the Bayesian Discount Prior Approach for Clinical Trials // Functions for data augmentation using the Bayesian discount prior method for single arm and two-arm clinical trials, as described in Haddad et al. (2017) doi:10.1080/10543406.2017.1300907. The discount power prior methodology was developed in collaboration with the The Medical Device Innovation Consortium (MDIC) Computer Modeling Simulation Working Group.
